message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500.  I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14,500 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product.  This would still give you a good profit and is closer to my budget.

Bob, I understand your position.  $13,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This still leaves some profit for me, and I'm hopeful it works for you. Let me know your thoughts.
